about_the_game:
Unlock Your Genius with Goolee!

Looking for a fun way to boost your brainpower? Goolee has two exciting game modes:

Normal Game: Take on 20 levels of mind-bending puzzles in Easy, Medium, or Hard modes. Sharpen your skills at your own pace and challenge yourself to get smarter with each level!

Battle of the Mind: Ready to compete? Choose from 4 challenges, including a monthly showdown and the special Techlympic mode. Go head-to-head with players worldwide and climb the leaderboard to prove you’re the best!

Whether you’re solving puzzles solo or battling others, Goolee helps you unlock your true potential. Start your journey today and unleash your inner genius!
detailed_description:
Unlock Your Genius with Goolee!

Looking for a fun way to boost your brainpower? Goolee has two exciting game modes:

Normal Game: Take on 20 levels of mind-bending puzzles in Easy, Medium, or Hard modes. Sharpen your skills at your own pace and challenge yourself to get smarter with each level!

Battle of the Mind: Ready to compete? Choose from 4 challenges, including a monthly showdown and the special Techlympic mode. Go head-to-head with players worldwide and climb the leaderboard to prove you’re the best!

Whether you’re solving puzzles solo or battling others, Goolee helps you unlock your true potential. Start your journey today and unleash your inner genius!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10 (Yosemite) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD 4000 or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Goolee

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD 4000 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“A simple game in a short time. Easy to understand and enjoyable. Not so tactical or mathematical but enough to assess your level logical thinking skills. happy to follow every open challenge organized. creative people don't like it. prove me if i'm wrong”
5 – Playstore

“This game will challenge your mind to find a way to solve the puzzle... Its good to give your brain some exercise and active... recommended”
5 – Playstore
short_description: Relax and exercise your brain with challenging goolee puzzles.
